archimate:Requirement.name: PS-3(3): Personnel Screening | Information Requiring Special Protective Measures
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Verify that individuals accessing a system processing, storing, or transmitting information requiring special protection: (a) Have valid access authorizations that are demonstrated by assigned official government duties; and (b) Satisfy [Assignment: organization-defined additional personnel screening criteria].

properties.value: Organizational information that requires special protection includes controlled unclassified information. Personnel security criteria include position sensitivity background screening requirements.
